summary: Completed comprehensive testing of duty scheduling calendar app. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend fully functional with excellent UI/UX - calendar loads properly, Add Duty workflow works end-to-end, date navigation functional, and responsive design working.
passed_tests: Backend: All 5 API endpoints working (GET/POST duties, GET/POST/DELETE schedule-duties)
Backend: 6 pre-seeded duties correctly loaded (G1-G3, P1, D1, L1)
Backend: Duty creation, scheduling, and removal all functional
Frontend: Page loads with all components (sidebar, header, calendar grid, controls)
Frontend: Time grid properly displays 0600-1800 time slots
Frontend: Add Duty button → dropdown → Single Duty modal workflow complete
Frontend: Duty search, selection, and adding to calendar grid working
Frontend: Create New Duty form functional
Frontend: Toast notifications appear on successful actions
Frontend: All header buttons enabled and accessible
Frontend: Sidebar navigation items all functional
